actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit the recovery by units of local government of surplus property donated by them to the U.S. Government, and subsequently declared to be surplus.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit the recovery by States and local governments of real property donated or sold by them to the United States, and subsequently declared to be surplus.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit the recovery by units of local government of surplus property donated by them to the U.S. Government, and subsequently declared to be surplus.
